name: Sludgly's Spooky Sandbox
description:
Oh no!  Sludgly has lost ALL of her bones!  Can you help her get them back so she has a skeleton again?

Controls -

  • WASD/Joystick > Move
  • Space/A Button > Jump
  • Left Click/X Button > Attack
  • Left Shift/Right Trigger > Get on/off broom
  • Escape/Menu Button > Options

Pixel Art font from www.dafont.com/pixel-arial-11.font
